s.text: Grilled on Fox by a hostile Brit Hume and Tony Snow, Buchanan calls George W. Bush's appeal to him to remain in the GOP "gracious" and "smart."
Grilled on Fox by a hostile Brit Hume and Tony Snow, Buchanan calls George W. Bush's appeal to him to remain in the GOP "gracious" and "smart."
Buchanan tells Snow that we should arm Taiwan but not necessarily declare war on China if it invades the island.
Buchanan tells Snow that we should arm Taiwan but not necessarily declare war on China if it invades the island.
Stay tuned to "Pundit Central" to find out how Ifill handles the privileges and responsibilities of pundit fame.
Snow then asks Buchanan: Does this imply we should not have gone to war with Germany over the Holocaust?
